images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful young Japanese model, embodying a top-tier gravure idol aesthetic, captured in a mirror reflection. She’s lounging poolside on a white sunbed, wearing a delicate, barely-there lavender lace bikini set with subtle floral embroidery, partially covered by a flowing, sheer white silk cover-up dress, damp from a recent swim. Her straight, jet-black hair cascades over her shoulder. She holds a tall glass of sparkling rosé champagne, gazing dreamily away from the camera, lost in thought. The background is a luxurious resort pool area with palm trees and blurred, colorful bokeh. Overcast soft sky light (陰天柔和自然光) illuminates her flawless, realistic skin – visible pores, faint peach fuzz. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, emphasizing depth of field, ray tracing, and global illumination, resulting in vibrant, colorful, and playfully cute imagery.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
